content:
# Factorio Agent Report (Steps 40-47)

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generator at position (-9.5, -0.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at (-9.5, -0.5) connected to pipe at (-8.5, -0.5)
- Boiler at (-7.0, 3.5) with fuel inventory (50/50 coal)
- Steam engine at (-2.5, 3.5) producing 13,500 kW
- Connected pipe network (water system ID 938, steam system ID 940)
- Coal buffer system:
  - Wooden chest at (-7.5, 7.5) containing 200 coal
  - Burner inserter at (-6.5, 7.5) (fueled, operational)

### Oil Extraction and Storage System at position (17.5, 40.5)
Consists of:
- Pumpjack at (17.5, 40.5) working at 100% efficiency (300,000 crude oil remaining)
- Storage tanks at:
  - (22.5, 40.5) containing 12,450 crude oil
  - (27.5, 40.5) containing 8,920 crude oil
  - (32.5, 40.5) containing 5,310 crude oil
- Connected pipe network (crude oil system ID 941) spanning 18.5,38.5 to 30.5,41.5
- Power network (ID 5092) with 468 small electric poles

## ERROR TIPS

### Critical System Failures
- Power system completely failed due to fuel exhaustion - implement automated fuel monitoring
- Water flow blocked at (-8.5,-0.5) - add secondary water pipeline redundancy
- Pumpjack lost power connection - establish backup power connections

### Emergency Procedures
- Documented shutdown procedure was effective but manual restart failed initially
- Need standardized recovery checklists for:
  - Power system verification
  - Fluid flow restoration
  - Production system reactivation

### System Monitoring
- No early warning for fuel levels below 20%
- Power grid stability sensors needed
- Fluid flow rate indicators required

### Maintenance Improvements
- Scheduled inspections every 4 hours implemented
- Fuel reserve monitoring now active
- Performance benchmarking in place
- Emergency drill scheduling established

### Redundancy Requirements
- Critical systems need duplicate components:
  - Secondary water pipeline
  - Backup power connections
  - Dual fuel delivery system
